inquiries.question: How can I improve the user experience on my website?
inquiries.answer: To improve user experience, focus on intuitive navigation, fast load times, and responsive design. Conduct user testing to gather feedback and make necessary adjustments.

inquiries.question: What are the best practices for SEO in 2024?
inquiries.answer: Best practices for SEO in 2024 include optimizing for mobile-first indexing, using high-quality content, leveraging AI tools for keyword research, and ensuring a secure website with HTTPS.

inquiries.question: How do I implement a dark mode feature on my website?
inquiries.answer: To implement dark mode, use CSS media queries to detect user preferences and apply a dark color scheme. Provide a toggle switch for users to manually switch between light and dark modes.
